turn.1: What happened in the 2010 Emirates Cup final?
turn.2: The comeback was completed in stoppage time, as substitute Georgios Samaras headed in Charlie Mulgrew's free kick.
turn.4: Later in the day the Arsenal played Milan.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?

turn.7: Who else was in the final?
turn.8: Arsène Wenger also named defender Laurent Koscielny, who partnered stand-in captain Thomas Vermaelen in central defence.

turn.10: Midfielder Mathieu Flamini started against his former side.
